sentences.sContent: He repudiated all offers of friendship.
sentences.sCn: 他拒绝任何人给他的友谊。

synos.tran: 拒绝；否定；批判；与…断绝关系；拒付

remMethod.val: re + pudi ( = put， 放) + ate → 放掉 → 拒绝接受

words.tran: 否认，拒绝；抛弃，断绝关系

trans.tranCn: 拒绝；否定；批判；与…断绝关系；拒付
trans.tranOther: to refuse to accept or continue with something
